Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
CodeContainerThis class coordinates between the classes, takes the input images, apply the framework described in the report, and returns the recognized hoop to the Main process
ContoursAndLinesCreates contrours from edges, decomposes the contours into sets of lines, rejects too small and too big contours
destination3dPointCoordinates transformation. Converts the points from pixel points into world coordinates relative to the origin point of the environment
HoopPositionHaving the center of the hoop and it's size, it will fit a plane using the xyz points of the hoop, calculate the normal to the plane and go to destination3dPoint to pass to world coordinates
LinkedLinesTakes the output of ContoursAndLines class (sets of lines), links them according to criterias discusses in the report
MyEllipsesTakes the linked lines from LinkedLines class and fit potential ellipses (after filtering the lines). Selects the best fit ellilpse to the hoop according to the depth values, it's orientation, size and edge values
pxIMUImageData
SegmentedDepthImageSegmentation using the disparity image
segmentedImageSmoothes the rectified input image with a gaussian filter, segments it using Canny edge detector. This is the first step in the computer vision part of the project
StereoProcResponsible for calculating the disparity image from the right and left grayscale input images. The disparity image is important in the choice of the fitted ellipse and the depth value of hoop in respect to the helicopter
WorldPlotterGUI Top view Generator
